alert.note: Alert for Mills; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:45PM CDT until May 07 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR MILLS...SOUTH CENTRAL POTTAWATTAMIE...EAST CENTRAL SARPY AND NORTHEASTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 744 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles south of Henderson, or 13 miles northwest of Red Oak, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 740 PM, 2 inch diameter hail was reported in Malvern. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bellevue, Offutt AFB, Plattsmouth, Glenwood, Oakland, Malvern, Treynor, Carson, Pacific Junction, Emerson, Macedonia, Silver City, Henderson, Hastings, Beaver Lake, Old Town Park and Mineola. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
